short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights new comments on Marginal Revolution blog posts written after your last visit to the post

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to better keep track of the conversation in the comments section of marginalrevolution.com blog posts?

This extension highlights new comments when you revisit the comments section on a Marginal Revolution blog post.
